resources.string: The Camera Permission is needed in order to turn on the flashlight. - You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to turn on the flashlight.

- The Modify Settings Permission is needed in order to modify system brightness. - You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to change the screen brightness. - To grant permission, click OK and select Generic Battery Drainer, then toggle the permission switch. - Would you like to grant this permission?

- The Access Fine Location Permission is needed in order to make GPS requests. - Your location data is not used, collected, saved or shared. - It is only invoked to make GPS requests to drain the battery - You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to drain the battery via making GPS requests. - Would you like to grant this permission?

- Wifi needs to be on to perform repeated Wifi scans. - Your wifi scan results are not used, collected, saved or shared. - You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to drain the battery via making Wifi scans. - Would you like to turn Wifi on?
